reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby work was finished. Hopefully room updates will follow as the hotel is very well priced, especially with the very reasonable breakfast that is included in the price. The room showed its age but was clean and comfortable enough for a one-night stay. The TV was ancient and not able to be adequately tuned. Bathroom serviceable and reasonably clean.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: I stayed in the hotel across the road last year. There is no comparison. The Days Inn is head and shoulders above it's competition across the road.
reviews.title: The Price Was Right

reviews.text: Very friendly check in and out. Strong wifi and A/C. Microwave and refrigerator in the room (very handy as Trader Joes and Whole Foods are right nearby). Everything was clean and pretty quiet. Free breakfast was "eh." Sure, the place could use some paint, new carpeting and furniture. There's no pool. But, it was $55-$57/night!
reviews.title: Cheap but

reviews.text: I will be back next year.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: Hotel was being painted while we were there, so the lobby was not open. Still the staff made everything easy and available. We stay here whenever we visit my daughter at UNC Chapel Hill and are very satisfied with the accomodations. Upholstery on chairs in the room was worn and ripped - that could use replacing.
reviews.title: Hotel was being painted while we were there, so the lobby...

reviews.text: First trip here was nice. Room was clean and well maintained. 2nd trip had different room with T.V. that was hard to hear unless cranked up high, bathroom paint was peeling, shower curtain torn, and somebody else's hair was in the shower when I checked into the room. Location is great and the cost is reasonable. I wish 2nd room was as good as first. Will be looking for other place to stay on subsequent trips to Chapel Hill.
reviews.title: 2nd time not as good as the first

reviews.text: The hotel was a bit off the main road, but was not hard to get to. Service was very good, the room was very clean,I was pleasantly surprized at the amenities in the room. The morning breakfast was just the right thing to get ones day started. The only thing I would advise the hotel to do is include a rubber mat for in the tub to prevent an accidental fall. It gets a bit slippery. Other than that our stay was pleasant . A lot of stores and restaurants were very near.
reviews.title: A great value
